analytic.title: Carefully Chosen Words? The Christological Intentionality in the Institution Narrative and the Epiclesis of the Syriac Anaphora of St. James

body.bibl: Spinks, Bryan Douglas. “Carefully Chosen Words? The Christological Intentionality in the Institution Narrative and the Epiclesis of the Syriac Anaphora of St. James.” In Studies on the Liturgies of the Christian East: Selected Papers of the Third International Congress of the Society of Oriental Liturgy Volos, May 26-30, 2010, edited by Steven Hawkes-Teeples, Bert Groen, and Stefanos Alexopoulos, 239–58. Eastern Christian Studies 18. Leuven: Peeters, 2013.
